reviews.author: Customer Review
reviews.text: The service staff behind the counter are very friendly. Pleasant atmosphere, described as a perfect place to enjoy beautiful sunsets at Tegeler See with a drink.

reviews.author: Verified Customer
reviews.text: Very friendly staff, delicious food and reasonable prices. Great location right by the Tegeler See.

reviews.author: Berlin Visitor
reviews.text: Perfect spot to relax by the lake. The ice cream is excellent and the atmosphere is wonderful on sunny days.
